1.title: The revenge saga begins
1.plot: Ichadhari Naag and Naagin, Vikrant and Ruhi are about to be united in marriage after a wait of 100 years . But their story takes a dark turn when they cross paths with some murderous hooligans. After being publicly shamed by the cast of Veere Di Wedding for harassment, this group of hooligans is in a vengeful mood and they take it out on Ruhi and Vikrant.

2.title: Vish out to avenge Vikrant's death
2.plot: Vish out to avenge Vikrant's death.

6.title: Episode #3.6
6.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

21.title: Bela going to kill Mahir?
21.plot: Is Bela going to kill Mahir?

25.title: Episode #3.25
25.plot: Stree, a threat for the Naagins?

31.title: Episode #3.31
31.plot: Mahir arrives at Shahnawaaz's location but his attempt to rescue Bela suffers an unexpected setback. Bela confronts Mahir and reveals that she has decided to divorce him and dedicate the rest of her life to Shahnawaaz.

32.title: Episode #3.32
32.plot: Mahir arrives at Shahnawaaz's location but his attempt to rescue Bela suffers an unexpected setback. Bela confronts Mahir and reveals that she has decided to divorce him and dedicate the rest of her life to Shahnawaaz.

33.title: Episode #3.33
33.plot: On the brink of confessing her identity and confessing her love, Bela realizes that she mistook Yuvraj for Mahir. She sees a heartbroken Mahir and the rest of the family standing witness to her misunderstood confession.

34.title: Episode #3.34
34.plot: Bela is left speechless when Yuvraj reveals himself to be Vikrant. She realizes that he wants revenge and that his next target is Mahir.

35.title: Episode #3.35
35.plot: When Vikrant reveals his plan to kill Mahir, Bela searches for ways to stop him. But Vikrant is left shocked when Bela reveals to him that she is in love with Mahir.

36.title: Episode #3.36
36.plot: Mahir and his family turn against Bela for the murder of Anu. Vish lures Ajitabh into the palace to meet Vikrant. Having revealed her true identity, Vish is joined by Vikrant and the two turn against Ajitabh.

37.title: Episode #3.37
37.plot: Vish promises to get hold of the Naagmani in hopes of becoming the next Naagrani. But she is shocked when Vikrant reveals that he intends to kill Mahir and make the Bela the next Naagrani.

38.title: Episode #3.38
38.plot: Bela's mother visits her in her dream and tries to reveal about Vikrant's true intentions. But before she can reveal the name, Vikrant wakes Bela from her sleep.

39.title: Episode #3.39
39.plot: Nagrani succeeds at entering the house after Mahir does what she had instructed. But her actual challenge surfaces when she encounters Vikrant and Vish.

40.title: Episode #3.40
40.plot: Bela's mother provides her with a clue to find out who her real enemy is in her dreams. While Mahir reveals his bold decision to divorce Bela to his parents, Bela searches for her adversary.

41.title: Episode #3.41
41.plot: Mahir comes across Bela's mother in the forest and accidentally ends up killing her right in front of Bela. Devastated, Bela vents out her emotions before Vikrant and swears to take revenge on Mahir and his family.

42.title: Episode #3.42
42.plot: Devastated by the fact that Mahir is responsible for her mother's death, Bela vows to kill Mahir. Not only that, she claims that she will kill Mahir before the end of the day.

43.title: Episode #3.43
43.plot: When Vikrant realizes that Bela didn't kill Mahir, he becomes suspicious about her feelings for him. Well aware that Bela won't kill Mahir, Vikrant decides to turn his life into a living hell.

44.title: Episode #3.44
44.plot: When Bela willingly gets engaged to Yuvraj, Mahir is left infuriated. Asking Mahir to trust her, Bela tells him that she has found a clue which might lead her to knowing Vikrant's true intentions.

45.title: Episode #3.45
45.plot: Vikrant takes advantage of Bela's vulnerability while she is changing her skin. He plans to achieve his lifelong dream of acquiring the mystical gem and tries to frame Bela for the murder of a servant.

46.title: Episode #3.46
46.plot: Bela is taken aback by Vyom's sudden arrival and the eccentricity surrounding him and his family. While Bela wonders if he and Vikrant are conspiring against her, Vikrant too is rattled by his arrival.

47.title: Episode #3.47
47.plot: Vikrant's plan to get rid of Mahir and becoming the Naagraj receives an unexpected setback when Bela strikes back with a plan of her own.

48.title: Episode #3.48
48.plot: Bela finds a trail of feathers in the Sehgal house which leads her to a shocking conclusion. She suspects that Vyom might be the intruder she has been looking for all along.

49.title: Episode #3.49
49.plot: The fierce battle between Bela and Vyom intensifies by leaps and bounds. In order to expose Vyom and his family in front of everyone, Bela, Vish and Yuvraj join hands and come up with a plan.

50.title: Episode #3.50
50.plot: Bela is optimistic that her alliance with Vish and Vikrant will help her defeat Vyom. Vyom, on the other hand, plans to expose Bela before Mahir and family.

51.title: Episode #3.51
51.plot: Despite using Juhi as a weapon, Vyom fails in his attempt to defeat Bela. Not willing to give up, he makes another move by misleading Mahir into believing that he is in a relationship with Bela.

52.title: Episode #3.52
52.plot: Bela has a nightmare where she sees Vyom and his people attacking her mercilessly. As she wakes up terrified from her dream, she senses that something is not right. Is Vyom planning another attack on Bela?

53.title: Episode #3.53
53.plot: When Juhi reveals her wish to be the Naagrani, Bela agrees instantly. But little does Bela know that Juhi is conspiring with Vyom and their only intention is to see Bela dead.

54.title: Episode #3.54
54.plot: With Vish and Vikrant's lives at stake, Bela is left with no choice but to crown Juhi as the Nagaarani. Heartbroken at her failure, Bela vows to save Juhi and retrieve the Naagmani.

55.title: Episode #3.55
55.plot: Mahir overhears Bela talking about how she has been conspiring against his family and how she murdered his brother Yuvraj. Filled with rage, he confronts her and questions her about the truth.

56.title: Episode #3.56
56.plot: Vish and Vikrant desperately search for Bela but, she is nowhere to be found. Mahir on the other hand seeks help from an ex-policeman who is a specialist in kidnapping.

57.title: Episode #3.57
57.plot: Bela reveals to Mahir how his brother and friends shot Vikrant and tried to physically molest her but, keeps her identity a secret.

58.title: Episode #3.58
58.plot: Sumitra confronts Bela and reveals that she is the Naagrani of the Nidhogvansh. She demands the Naagmani from Bela, and the confrontation soon turns into a vicious fight between the two.

59.title: Episode #3.59
59.plot: Unaware of Yuvraj's death, Mahir refuses to begin his daughter's naming ceremony and awaits his arrival. To everyone's surprise, Yuvraj makes an entry with Bela and Vish presuming that he is Vikrant in disguise.

60.title: Episode #3.60
60.plot: Bela gets alarmed when she finds blood seeping out of Mahir's room. Fearing that something had happened to him and the baby, she barges in only to find Vish lying on the floor with her wrist slit open.

61.title: Episode #3.61
61.plot: After confessing her love for Mahir, Vish shocks the family by revealing that she is pregnant with his child. She further reveals that Bela is having an affair with Yuvraj.

62.title: Episode #3.62
62.plot: With only a small amount of time left for Vish and Mahir's wedding, a desperate Bela tries to execute her plan to trigger Mahir's memory. But Sumitra is one step ahead of her with her own sinister plan in place.

63.title: Episode #3.63
63.plot: Bela interferes with Vish and Mahir's wedding ceremony. Despite Sumitra's resistance, Bela stands her ground and publicly confesses her romantic feelings for Mahir.

64.title: Episode #3.64
64.plot: To get Naagmani's location from Bela, Sumitra holds Bela's mother at knife point and threatens to kill her. With Yuvraj's help, Sumitra manages to tackle Bela, Vish and Vikrant.

65.title: Episode #3.65
65.plot: Sumitra pushes Bela down the hill. As she is tumbling down the steep slope, Mahir attempts to rescue her.

66.title: Episode #3.66
66.plot: Sumitra threatens a wealthy family and arranges Mahir's wedding with their daughter. But, little does Sumitra know that a stranger has been following her and soon will be disrupting her plans of getting rich.

67.title: Episode #3.67
67.plot: Sumitra's plan takes a hit when she learns that the bride is none other than Bela posing as Shuli.

68.title: Episode #3.68
68.plot: Vish cleverly replaces the medicine which was the reason for Mahir's deteriorating mental health. As a result, he recollects his memories and remembers Bela, only to be unconscious again due to the deathly attack by Sumitra.

69.title: Episode #3.69
69.plot: Bela is rendered helpless after Vish and Mahir find themselves in Sumitra's captivity. She manages to get the Naagmani but is soon cornered by Sumitra and her allies.

70.title: Episode #3.70
70.plot: Sumitra obnoxiously flaunts her victory of gaining the Naagmani and its powers. However, her world comes to a screeching halt when she sees the Naagmani missing and the guards reveal to her that Vish stole it from them.

1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Hrithik wakes up from a bad dream and is asked by his Tanvi as to what did he dream about. Elsewhere, Yamini asks her husband to take off his black suit and then he is asked by his niece to come soon for the prayer service. On the other hand, a pandit tells Yamini that her son needs to get married before the age of 25 or otherwise his life will be in trouble. Later, Hrithik hits an old man with his car and decides to take him to the hospital. In the meantime, Hrithik and his relatives joke around about ghosts being in the haveli but Yamini interrupts their ...

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: A pandit blesses Sesha to carry out the destruction of Raheja family. In the meantime, Hrithik loses his consciousness at the cliff. Meanwhile, Yamini and rest of the family go with the police in search of Hrithik. Meanwhile, a woman helps Hrithik come up from the cliff and later she declines from disclosing her name to him. Meanwhile, Hrithik's father tells everyone that they are leaving for Mumbai immediately. Later on, Hrithik goes to thank the lady that helped him out and later, saves her from the falling roof. Also, Hrithik's father gets shocked at seeing a ...

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: Hrithik wakes up from a dream of snake and questions Shivanya if she is related to a family of snakes. On the other hand, Ankush and Yamini get shocked at seeing a poster in the house and hide it. Meanwhile, Shivanya thinks about stopping Hrithik's marriage at all cost. In the meantime, Ankush requests the pundit to change the date of Hrithik's marriage and Yamini joins their conversation. Later, Hrithik tells Tanvi that he doesn't want to hurt her and is marrying her just for her happiness but not for love. On the other hand, Shivanya meets Viren at the hotel room ...

39.title: Episode #1.39
39.plot: Shivanya gets shocked on seeing the photo given by Sesha as Hrithik's father is in it and then think as to how is Yamini connected to all this. On the other hand, Yamini questions Hrithik as to why is he alone during the party and then asks the same question to Shivanya. Later, Yamini gets shocked on getting to know that Shivanya is a naagin and then decides to plan something against her. Elsewhere, Sesha gets shocked on seeing the mark on Shivanya's neck and after being told about the problem, she decides to meet Gurudev.

43.title: Episode #1.43
43.plot: Yamini gives jewelry as a gift to Shivanya and as she starts crying and is asked about the problem, she tells about her brother being still alive and him having killed the naagin couple. On the other hand, Hrithik takes Sesha, who is in the disguise of Shivanya, along to give her a surprised and Yamini get surprised looking at them as the real Shivanya is with her. Later on, Sesha kills the owner of jewellery store and then leaves with Hrithik as Shivanya. Stay tuned to know what happens next. Elsewhere, Hrithik's real father does not find the book and thinks that ...

44.title: Episode #1.44
44.plot: Hrithik stops the sadhus from harming Shivanya. In the meantime, Yamini tells Sesha that she can have the naagmani if she marries Hrithik.

45.title: Episode #1.45
45.plot: Hritik surprises Shivanya with a cake for their six month anniversary and soon, they discuss the dream he had. On the other hand, Ankush tells Yamini that he is scared of her love and adds that she looks beautiful when she is angry but is soon told the plan to kill at-least one naagin. Later on, Shivanya stops Sesha from killing Ankush and tells about killing him herself, and asks her to stay with the celebrations in her sister's getup.

46.title: Episode #1.46
46.plot: Yamini complements Hrithik for his decision and asks Shivanya (Sesha) if she is getting married of her own will. In the meantime, Sesha hopes for her sister, Shivanya to come back to stop the marriage. Elsewhere, Ankush searches and calls out for Shivanya but gets attacked by a few women. On the other hand, a police officer informs Hrithik, Yamini and others that Ankush is in jail, and this stops the marriage.

47.title: Episode #1.47
47.plot: Yamini is searching for the Nagmani in the havelli. Shivanya follows her and comes across an unknown part of the havelli which she has not seen before. Meanwhile, Yamini hurts Govind Kaka with a dagger and on hearing his shouts, Sangram Singh comes running to find out what happened. On the other hand, Shivanya finds a crack in the wall and sees bright light coming through it. She realizes that the Nagmani is somewhere on the other side of the wall and she transforms herself into a naagin to reach there. Will Shivanya be able to lay her hands on the Nagmani before ...

48.title: Episode #1.48
48.plot: Shivanya wants to reveal Yamini's reality to Hritihik, but he is in a romantic mood and hugs Shivanya. Meanwhile, Yamini arrives in the scene and then watches Hrithik hugging Shivanya. Later, the pooja is about to start in their house, through which Yamini intends to end Shivanya's life. However, to escape from the effects of the pooja, Shivanya trips and falls from the stairs on purpose, once again ruining Yamini's plans. Will Shivanya be able to bring out Yamini's truth in front of Hrithik?

49.title: Episode #1.49
49.plot: Shivanya apologies to Hrithik for having doubted his mother and as he asks her to not cry, she suggests him to give her a chance to make it up to him. On the other hand, Guruma gives a naagin to Yamini to keep Sesha and Shivanya at bay. In the meantime, Hrithik gets confirmation that Shivanya with him is actually Sesha and tries to harm her. Elsewhere, Shivanya tries to get free from the trap of Guruma.

50.title: Episode #1.50
50.plot: Yamini tells Hrithik that only he can save his dad and adds that she will come along with him. Elsewhere, Ankush calls out Sangram and asks him to come out from his hiding place but soon comes across Shivanya.

51.title: Episode #1.51
51.plot: After talking to Yamini, Sesha thinks about getting the naagmani for herself and them immediately leaves. On the other hand, Hrithik tells Yamini that the naagmani is of no use and it should be given back to the sheshnag but she thinks about stopping it somehow.

52.title: Episode #1.52
52.plot: Yamini comes looking for Sesha in her room and not finding her there she starts looking for the nagmani. However, she is surprised to find that the nagmani is not in the locker and thinks that Sesha has taken the nagmani with her. Meanwhile, Shivanya hurries towards Ritik with the nagmani in order to save him. She arrives there and is able to bring Ritik back to life and reunite him with his real father.

53.title: Episode #1.53
53.plot: Shesha finds the place where Shivanya's body is burred, having learned about the place from Yamini. Meanwhile, Ritik, along with Sangram Singh, watches Shesha looking for Shivanya. He decides to go and save Shivanya as he feels that she would not be able to hold her breath burred beneath the earth for so long. However, Sangram Singh stops him from doing so, reminding him that Shesha is still there. Will Ritik be able to save Shivanya?

54.title: Episode #1.54
54.plot: Guru Maa uses her black magic to bring down the temperature and summon a tornado, which drives Ritik and Shivanya out of the Shiva temple. Ritik gets intimate with Shivanya after saving her from inside an ice boulder. What will be its repercussions?

55.title: Episode #1.55
55.plot: Ritik hugs Shivanya, who is actually Sesha, and asks her as to where had she gone and then tells her never to leave him. Sesha then get's Ritik involved in a romantic moment, but it is just in order to get the nagmani from him. Meanwhile, the real Shivanya is trapped somewhere and Yamini comes and releases her from her bounds and takes her along to steal the nagmani back. Later, Sesha and Ritik reach the place where the nagmani is kept and just as he is about to give the nagmani to Sesha, Shivanya reaches there and stops Ritik. What happens next?

56.title: Episode #1.56
56.plot: Ritik is not ready to leave Shivanya alone at the temple because he's afraid that Shesha and Yamini might do anything in order to get the nagmani. He assures Shivanya that he would tell Amrita and Angad about the reality that she did not kill their father, Ankush Raheja. Ritik also asks her not to worry about Yamini as she would not do anything to harm her there. But he adds that he is worried about Sesha coming there in any form. He gives the ring that protects him to Shivanya and also assures her that nothing would happen to him.

57.title: Episode #1.57
57.plot: Shivanya comes to the temple and questions Gurudev that where is the nagmani. When the Gurudev tells her that it is where she and Ritik kept her, Shivanya realizes that it must have been Sesha in Ritik's form who sent her away from the house. Later, Sesha takes Ramya's form and attends the engagement function where she directs Shivanya towards her room. Then Sesha guides Kabir to the room and tells him to kill Shivanya. Will Kabir kill Shivanya or will Ritik be able to save her.

58.title: Episode #1.58
58.plot: Shivanya tries to talk sense into Sesha that she is befriending a mongoose, Kabir, who is a snake's natural enemy. But Sesha says that she would do anything to attain the nagmaani and warns Shivanya that if she doesn't follow her orders, she would hurt Ritik. Later, Yamini witnesses Ritik being held captive by the Naagin but walks out after realizing that it's not the real Ritik. Ritik, meanwhile, frees himself and goes to save Shivanya.

59.title: Episode #1.59
59.plot: The saint at the Shiv temple saves Sangram from the poisonous flies that have entered his body, with the help of honey. Meanwhile, Sesha is thinking as to how would she kill Shivanya in the party as there are so many people around. However, Kabir comes for her help and asks her to change herself into his wife and they both go down to the party to carry out their plan of killing Shivanya. However, Sesha's plan backfires when Kabir is forced to turn into a mongoose and Sesha turns herself into a snake to fight him. Later, Kabir returns and kidnaps Ritik; and Shivanya ...

60.title: Episode #1.60
60.plot: Kabir desperately tries to end Ritik's life and keeps on forcing him to hand over the naagmani to him. Meanwhile, Shivanya arrives there and with Sesha's help, she kills Kabir and frees Ritik. Later, Shivanya and Ritik get to know about an ancient rivalry between the Chandravanshi's and the Suryavanshi's. Can Shivanya stop Yamini and Sesha as they plot to re-ignite this rivalry?

61.title: Episode #1.61
61.plot: Shivanya goes to the temple of Goddess Kaali and her Gurudev comes there. Her Gurudev tells Shivanya to perform a dance in such a way that Goddess Kaali herself comes and blesses her. He says that his prayers would commence after Shivanya's 'Taandav' only. Shivanya pays heeds to her Guruji's words and performs a 'Taandav' with all her heart. Meanwhile, Rithik also comes there and watches Shivanya do the Taandav and then joins her in the same. Will Goddess Kaali bless Shivanya?

62.title: Episode #1.62
62.plot: The battle for the Naagmani reaches its climax with Avantika and Sesha taking the Chandravanshi's side. Ritik and Shivanya must summon all their courage, faith and strength to prevent the Naagmani from being usurped and misused.

1.title: Rocky and Shivangi First Meet
1.plot: Three months have passed since Ritik and Shivanya saved the Naagmani from Shesha. The time seems to be going by normally for them without any troubles and Shivanya is pregnant with Ritik's child. However, after three months some people start chasing them and want to take their life. While trying to escape from them, Shivanya falls down and experiences labor pain. Ritik manages to take her to the hospital and the doctor is shocked to know that Shivanya is experiences labor pain in just the third month of her pregnancy. Ritik is nervous and waits as the doctors take ...

2.title: Yamini Alive?
2.plot: Shivangi loses her conscious and falls down after killing the wolf. However, Rocky comes there in the cave and takes her out of there. On the other hand, the police are trying to find out about Rocky's whereabouts and just then the constable comes to inform the Inspector that they have found the dead body of a wolf in the jungle. The police are able to find out Rocky and Shivangi after a while after a while and get them back to their houses. Later, Shivanya tells Shivangi that she has to get married now and also informs her that Aditya is coming to see her for ...

3.title: Episode #2.3
3.plot: Yamini and Shesha are planning how to take the nagmani back from Shivanya and how to use Shivanya herself to do so. Rocky, meanwhile, finally tells Shivangi that he loves her a lot and cannot live without her. However, Shivangi reminds him that he is getting married to someone else. So, she tells Rocky that she does not love him and wants him to go away from her life. On the other hand, it is the night when whatever a Naagin wishes for is fulfilled. Shesha goes to Shivanya's house and finds out that she is dead. Shesha is really happy and informs Yamini that she is on...

4.title: Episode #2.4
4.plot: Shivangi gets shot as Yamini wanted to kill the girl whom Rocky loves. Rocky, Yamini and Shivanya take Shivangi to the hospital. On the other hand, Shesha warns and beats Aditya up very badly. The doctors, meanwhile, remove the bullets from Shivangi's body and tell Shivanya and Rocky that if she does not regain her consciousness in 3-4 hours, she would die. Later, Shivanya goes to the Shiv temple and prays to Lord Shiva for her daughter's life.

5.title: Alliance Is Formed
5.plot: Sesha breaks the wall that had kept the Mahishmitis captive for 25 years and wakes them up. Queen Avantika also wakes up and asks Shesha to remind Yamini of the promise she had made. Sesha goes to Yamini and asks her to forgive her and then invites two people in. Yamini is shocked to see Avantika standing in front of her. Avantika reminds Yamini how she had saved her life 25 years ago and how she had to save the Mahishmitis. But Shesha remembered and had gone to save them. Avantika reminds Yamini of her promise and asks her to find out about the heir to the ...

6.title: Bloody Wedding
6.plot: Yamini imagines that she has killed Shivanya and is daydreaming when Sesha comes there and wakes her out of her trance. Sesha advises Yamini to actually go and kill Shivanya, while she takes care of other stuff. Shivanya is yet unaware of the fact that Yamini is alive. Meanwhile, Sesha plans to get rid of Shivangi and get married to Rocky as Shivanya had earlier married Ritik, whom Sesha loved. Sesha plans to take her revenge and enters Shivangi's room in disguise. On the other hand, Yamini is following Shivanya with a knife in her hand in order to stab her to death.

7.title: Shivange Death
7.plot: Sesha is on a revenge taking spree and she captures Shivangi and brings her to a cliff. Sesha confronts Shivangi and tells her that Shivanya took Ritik from him while Shivangi is on her way to take Rocky away from her. Just then Mahishmati and Yamini arrive there with others. Yamini stops Sesha from killing Shivanya, but Sesha is not ready to listen. Even Mahishmati tries to explain to Sesha, but she is in an angry mood and wants to kill Shivangi. However, it is revealed that the person they all are thinking to be Shivangi is actually Shivanya and in a flashback it is...

8.title: Rockey a Killer?
8.plot: Yamini, Rani Avantika, Sesha and the others are drinking champagne and rejoicing on Shivanya and Shivangi's death. However, Yamini is worried as to how would they reach the Naagmani now. Rani Avantika points at Sesha and says that she would guide them, but Sesha wants to get married first. On the other hand, Shivangi is alive and in the temple with her Gurudev and wants to learn to become a naagin. Shivangi is keen on becoming a naagin without wasting a day's time as she wants to avenge her mother's death. Meanwhile, Yamini puts up an act and lies on the bed, with the...

9.title: Auspicious Night
9.plot: he celebrations are in full flow as it is Rocky's and Shesha's engagement day and everyone dances in joy. Rocky also dances with Sesha and imagines her to be Shivangi. Sesha then says that she knew that one day Rocky would definitely start loving her. Meanwhile, a lady who can read the future also attends the function as she is a friend of Badi Maa. She tells Rocky that her wife would be from somewhere else and she'll be someone far away from human life and not a human. The lady tells him that someone very different and not at all familiar would be Rocky's wife. ...

10.title: The Nagins Wedding
10.plot: Shivangi falls down from a cliff and when she opens her eyes she's at a place with floating mountains and there is a Shivling on top of those. Shivangi is shocked to see herself transforming into a Naagin and just then a Sheshnaag appears and blesses Shivangi. They tell her that Shivangi is Shivanya's daughter and how she is both the caretaker of the Naagmani and also a Naagin who can change her form. Meanwhile, Sesha is getting her Mehndi on her hands and Yamini is putting Mehndi on her hands. Maheshmati says that she will do Sesha's Kanyadaan and Yamini is impressed...

11.title: After the Wedding
11.plot: Rocky is upset that he almost lost the one he loved and within 7 days of her death he was about to get married to someone else. Yamini tells him that the woman he loves returned back to him at the right time and had he been married to Ruchika then it would have been too late. Yamini asks Rocky to be happy with the woman he loves. Meanwhile, Maheshmiti is outside Sesha's room, and Sesha is mad with anger and breaking things inside. Yamini comes there and they both enter the room after Sesha's anger has died down a little. Sesha says that she wants to be with rocky, but...

12.title: 1st Killer Dead
12.plot: Sesha tells Yamini that Chitti slapped her and therefore she wants to take her revenge as she is upset. Yamini laughs at this and then tells Chitti to slap herself 4 times across her face. Chitti tells Yamini that Sesha was trying to hypnotize her husband into her fake love and that's the reason she slapped her. Meanwhile, Shivangi takes Shesha's form and invites Amar into her room and later tells him to meet her inside Kali Maa's temple. Amar goes to the temple and gets shocked to find out that Shivangi is a Nagin in reality. Then Shivangi avenges her mother's murder...

13.title: New Naag New Revenge
13.plot: Shivangi is in Yamini's room looking for something and Yamini just comes there. Yamini asks her as to what is she doing in her room, and Shivangi tells her that she came to look for her marriage album and Yamini gives it to her. As Shivangi is going out she makes a promise to herself that she would find out the reality that Yamini is hiding. As Shivangi is going back to Rocky's room, Mr. Srivastav confronts her and asks her as to where Rocky is as he has to take his signatures on some documents. She takes him to Rocky, where Mr. Srivastav hands Amar's will to Rocky ...

14.title: Hide N Seek
14.plot: Shivangi is one step closer to taking her revenge against Mahishmati and gets her locked in a room where she cannot use her powers. Shivangi keeps warning Mahishmati that she will take her life and it is the end of her days. Just then the black Nagin hears Avantika shouting in the room and enters their and saves her. Later, Yamini gathers Avantika and the others in the Shiv Temple where everything had started.

15.title: First Attack on Mahishmati
15.plot: Yamini, along with Mahishmati, recognises the Ichadhari Naag as it is a full moon night and asks Maanav to catch him. However, the Naag escapes them and then confronts Yamini and Mahishmati to warn them that he is here to take his revenge against them all. On the other hand, Sesha is lying unconscious in Kaali Mata's temple and the priestess is worried as to how to bring her back to life as she has been bitten by a scorpion. The priestess starts saying some Mantras and the scorpion comes and takes the poison out of Sesha's body, and she comes back to her senses. ...

16.title: Episode #2.16
16.plot: Yamini watches the blue colour on the beehive and realises that if Avantika drinks the honey from there, she would die. But its too late and they are unable to stop Avantika from drinking the venom. The Naag then turns up there and tries to throw Yamini off the cliff, but Sesha saves her. On the other hand, Rocky is waiting for Shivangi to get ready and is waiting for her outside the room. He goes inside to check on her, and realises that Shivangi is not there and calls her but in vain as her phone is not reachable. Meanwhile, Sesha takes Yamini to Avantika, to find ...

17.title: Episode #2.17
17.plot: It is Diwali and everyone is celebrating the same. Shivangi is searching for Vikram, as to where he is. Meanwhile, Rocky comes up to his uncle, who complains to him that he has made every husband suffer right now. On the other hand, the shesh naag is in Shivangi's form and Shivangi watches from the terrace as Rocky looks at the fake Shivangi with love. Meanwhile, the fake Shivangi sends Vikram to the terrace on the pretext of getting the crackers from the roof top. Shivangi abducts Vikram and shows him her true form, and tells him that she is there to take her ...

18.title: Episode #2.18
18.plot: Avantika and Sesha manage to kill Rudra, the shesh naag and bury him, while Shivangi watches them bury him. Then Avantika and Sesha leave the place, and Yamini asks Kapalika to go and rest in her cave, while she also leaves the place. Shivangi rushes to the place where they have buried Rudra and takes him out of the grave and takes him to her Gurudev in the Shiv temple. She asks her Gurudev to save Rudra and her Gurudev tells her that only a golden herb can save Rudra now, that too if Shivangi manages to fetch it within the next eight hours. However, her Gurudev warns...

19.title: Episode #2.19
19.plot: Yamini's husband's elder brother comes to her and demands his share in the Naagmani that she had promised him in return for a new family. He warns her that if she does not do so, he would reveal the reality in front of Rocky that all the people in the house have been hired by her for her drama and no one is her real relative. Meanwhile, Shivangi asks Rocky permission to go and meet her friend, who has come to town for her marriage. In reality, Shivangi just wants time enough to be away from Rocky without him interfering as she continues to take her revenge against her...

20.title: Episode #2.20
20.plot: Rocky asks Shivangi if she knows Rudra from before, and Shivangi makes an excuse that she knows him from the time he came to get the property papers signed. Afterwards, Yamini gathers everyone to inform them that Alia and Rudra love each other a lot and that is why she is thinking of getting them engaged. Everyone rushes to congratulate Rudra and Alia, while Sesha walks up to Rocky to tell him that she finds Rudra to be weird. Shivangi, meanwhile, thinks that Rudra cannot marry Alia as she is innocent and Alia cannot be taken advantage of.

21.title: Episode #2.21
21.plot: Yamini is not happy that Rocky has not taken Shivangi out after their marriage and it has been a month now. So, on her saying, Rocky and Shivange leave the house to spend some time with each other on an outing. On their way, they are about to meet with an accident by an uncontrolled truck, but they are somehow saved. The truck, however, ends up hitting an old woman. Rocky and Shivangi take her to a hospital as an act of humanity and then they continue with their journey. Rocky's shirt has the woman's blood stains on it and Shivangi asks him to make a u-turn and go ...

22.title: Episode #2.22
22.plot: Shivangi comes back home and all her sisters-in-law and brothers-in-law ask her to play with them. Sesha, meanwhile, thinks that Shivangi came back after her return and deduces that Shivangi was the Naagin in that cave. On the other hand, Rocky calls Shivangi, but just then she enters the room. Shivangi is about to say something, but Rocky says that it is nothing and he was just worried for her well-being. Rocky is very emotional and says that he loves her, but he no longer knows whether Shivangi believes in this marriage or not.

23.title: Episode #2.23
23.plot: Sesha finds the skin of a snake and shows it to Yamini and then Sesha burns it as she believes that the snake dies if his skin is burned. Yamini tries to stop her thinking it to be the skin of Rudra, but Sesha does not listen and burns the skin. Shivangi, meanwhile, starts feeling a burning sensation in her body and screams and Rocky comes to help her out. It turns out that the skin which Sesha got her hands on is actually Shivangi's skin. Rudra somehow gets to know that its the skin of Shivangi and if it burns completely then Shivangi will never be able to come in ...

24.title: Episode #2.24
24.plot: Shivangi wonders that why has Rudra not come yet. She hopes that Rudra is not in any kind of trouble and thinks that if she waits any longer, the people in the house will start doubting her. Meanwhile, Yamini asks Kapalika to use her powers and find out where Rudra has hidden the Naagmani. Kapalika tries to shush her, but Yamini only chides her even more. Kapalika then says that without her permission somebody is entering her cave.

25.title: Episode #2.25
25.plot: Shivangi sprinkles red colour on all the horns that she found in the box, as per the instructions given to her by Gurudev. Gurudev had told her that if she sprinkles this red colour on the horn which has rudra, it will turn red. All the horns turn red and Shivangi gets confused, but somehow manages to find the correct horn. The bull, meanwhile, senses that someone has been in the den, so he rushes to find the person and Shivangi bites him and goes away. She takes out Rudra from that horn and faints. Rudra comes to know from Gurudev that the horn is very powerfull, and...

26.title: Episode #2.26
26.plot: Rudra gives a bottle of poison to Shivangi and asks her to call Rocky to the Shiv temple on Karwachauth in order to give him poison in his food. Rocky eavesdrop on this entire conversation and feels hurt. Meanwhile, Avantika asks Yamini as to where the Naagmani is, but she replies that she does not have it. Yamini says that Sesha and Avantika should kill the two Naags so that she can take the Naagmani with ease then. Avantika and Sesha leave, while Yamini thinks of how to take the Naagmani and escaping unnoticed. Meanwhile, Shivangi gives the poison, calling it a ...

27.title: Episode #2.27
27.plot: The sixth killer of Shivangi's mother comes in the dungeon and she and Rudra follow him to the dungeon in order to see his real face. However, after staying for a few moments in front of Ritik's picture, the killer goes in the maze. Meanwhile, on thinking that Rudra and Shivangi are up to something, Rocky follows them in the maze as well. Rudra and Shivangi keep following the killer in order to see his face, while Rocky searches for them both in the maze. However, it is a trap laid by Kapalika and the killer and she manages to capture both Rudra and Shivangi in their ...

28.title: Episode #2.28
28.plot: Shivangi is lying next to Rocky and then a gush of wind shuts the window. Listening to the noise Rocky wakes up and asks Shivangi that what is she doing there. Shivangi tells him that she came because he slept while reading and was taking off his glasses, but Rocky asks her to not act here and adds that he will keep an eye on her in this house. Rocky assures Shivangi that he will find out that why is she doing all this. Shivangi, meanwhile, is madly in love with Rocky now as she knows that he is not one of her mother's killer.

29.title: Episode #2.29
29.plot: Shivangi tells Rudra that she wants to reach her destination with his help. Rocky overhears this and misunderstands everything and leaves. Shivangi then goes on to tell Rudra that she loves Rocky a lot and had to save him under all circumstances. Rudra then asks Shivangi to save the Naagmani now, as she has already saved Rocky. Rudra says that they have to bring the Naagmani back again. Shivangi states that she will bring the Naagmani back as it reached the wrong hands because of her. Later, her guru also chides her for this and a storm starts in the area.

30.title: Episode #2.30
30.plot: Shivangi kills another enemy and tries to take the Naagmani, but just then the bull comes there and takes the Naagmani. With the Naagmani gone, Shivangi gets worried that who took the Naagmani as it was there just a moment ago. The next day, Yamini is wondering that once Avantika brought her back to life and now she has saved Avantika once, so she no longer is in her debt. Yamini is sure that Avantika won't sting her now and kill her. Just the Avantika comes there and asks Yamini if Kapalika is really dead. Yamini tells Avantika that Kapalika really has died, adding ...

31.title: Episode #2.31
31.plot: Yamini says that she is going to bed, but just then the bull comes in with drinks for everyone, stating that they should put some life in the party. The bull says that they should all play a game in which everyone has to say something they have never done and drink or else they would be given a task. The bull, while playing, gives a hint that he has never stolen a diamond or something like a Mani in life. Shivangi gets a hint and Yamini takes a drink as she has stolen a diamond, even Shivangi takes a sip from her drink. As the games are going on, Rocky comes down and ...

32.title: Episode #2.32
32.plot: Maheesh blackmails Shivangi to return his horn back to him or else he would kill a member of the house she is married in. However, Shivangi understands that Maheesh is just bluffing and ignores his warning. But in order to make Shivangi realize the seriousness of his warning, Maheesh makes the chandelier fall on Shivangi's brother-in-law on his birthday. Later, Shivangi realizes that he poison has the powers of killing as well as healing a person back to life. Shivangi takes the poison and gives it to her brother-in-law and he gets better. Later, Shivangi comes with ...

33.title: Episode #2.33
33.plot: Sesha reaches the cold storage area where Maheesh's frozen body is. Maheesh's head and his hand are lying away from his body after being decapitated. Sesha rejoins Maheesh's body and brings him back to life and then informs him that they have his horn with them. Sesha asks Maheesh to remember his promise and give them the Naagmani in return for his horn. Later, Rudra and Shivangi change themselves into Maheesh and Sesha and manage to take the horn from Yamini.

34.title: Episode #2.34
34.plot: Sesha gets angry as Avantika's magic bowl does not show her anything. Sesha suggests Avantika to keep her useless bowl to herself and then gives it to Yamini to have a look at her face in the bowl. Yamini tells Sesha that the bowl is magical and will show them what Mahish is up to. Sesha gets worried and states that she wants to see how her Rocky is as she is worried for him. Sesha and Yamini start fighting with each other but Avantika shuts them both up. Sesha, later, goes to save Rocky and Yamini gets worried that how will they get the Naagmani. Avantika suggests ...

35.title: Episode #2.35
35.plot: Shivangi and Sesha are dancing in the Shiv temple in front of the Shivling in order to please Lord Shiva so that he saves Rocky's life. However, Mahish reaches there and disrupts their holy dance, leaving both Shivangi and Sesha unconscious. On the other hand, people start Maa Durga's prayers and praise her, while Shivangi starts coming back to her senses. Mahish reaches the place where the people are praying to Maa durga and disrupts the entire prayer service. Shivangi regains her consciousness and reaches to face Mahish. Will Shivangi be able to end Mahish?

36.title: Episode #2.36
36.plot: Shivangi is pondering whether she should tell about her reality to Rocky or not. Shivangi wonders if Rocky would understand that she really loves him but the people in his house are the murderers of her mother, Shivanya. Just then Rocky comes and asks Shivangi as to where she had been. Rocky then says that he knows that Shivangi must have gone to choose a gift for him for Valentine's Day and then goes on to give her a gift which he had brought. Shivangi opens the gift and is pleased to see a pendant in the shape of a star, a promise of eternal love from Rocky.

37.title: Episode #2.37
37.plot: A function is going on at Rocky's house to celebrate the Valentine's Day and as everyone is dancing, Rocky is looking for Shivangi. Meanwhile, Shivangi and Rudra have found their next target. But Manav states that they cannot kill him as he is wearing a charm to protect himself. Rudra, however, states that they can kill him by burning him and Rudra lights the room on fire. Later, Shivangi tricks Yamini into getting out of the house and also secures the locket she is wearing with the help of Rudra.

38.title: Episode #2.38
38.plot: To avenge her mother's death, Shivangi kills Yamini and then rushes to Rudra to save his life. Rudra and Shivangi, along with Guruji, pray to Lord Shiva and thank him for helping them taking a step closer towards their goal. Now, Shivangi is worried about Rocky as he is not able to face the fact that his Badi Maa, Yamini, is no more. Since his parents passed away, Yamini was everything to Rocky. Rocky panics and sends everyone in the house to look for Shivangi and also asks his cousin to help him get a team of private detectives.

39.title: Episode #2.39
39.plot: Yamini is alive and tells Uttara that she is doing a great deed by bringing up an orphan and then reminds Uttara of how they killed Rocky's parents and adopted him. Yamini then plans to get hold of the naagmani by tricking Shivangi as she is unaware that Yamini is alive. On the other hand, Vikram is back and he is planning to expose Shivangi in front of Rocky.

40.title: Episode #2.40
40.plot: Rudra is angry and plans to give Sesha and Avantika the treatment which animals get. Meanwhile, Yamini invites Shivangi somewhere in order to show her something, but Shivangi seems aware of her plans. On the other hand, Sesha gets captured in the trap set by Rudra and he is very happy. Yamini, with the help of her apprentice, knocks Shivangi unconscious in the place she has brought her to. Later, Sesha and Rudra join hands in achieving their own objectives. Rudra desires Shivangi and Sesha wants Rocky in her life.

41.title: Episode #2.41
41.plot: Mansi is shocked to see so many gifts in the house and questions Rocky as to why is there such a party. Rocky tells her that he has achieved an award for his hard work. Nidhi sees Uttara drinking in the party and then she takes advantage of the situation and questions her about her views about an Icchadhari Naagin and Naag. Later, when Shivangi reveals her true identity to Uttara, Nidhi sees her.

42.title: Episode #2.42
42.plot: Nidhi watches Shivangi as she has Uttara in her clutches. Nidhi is shocked to see that Shivangi is a Naagin and gets scared of her. However, Shivangi catches Nidhi and tries to make her understand, but in all this Uttara escapes from Shivangi's grasp. Meanwhile, Rocky enters the old Haveli and gets curious about the book on Naagmani. Rocky wonders that why Shivangi reads this book and decides to find out the reason for it, which is why he lands up in his ancestral mansion.

43.title: Episode #2.43
43.plot: Mansi is about to open the refrigerator in which Uttara's dead body is kept. However, Nidhi and Shivangi manage to divert Mansi from opening the refrigerator. After Mansi leaves, Nidhi asks Shivangi that what is Uttara's dead body still doing in the refrigerator. On the other hand, Rocky seems to have found out about Shivangi's true identity. Rudra informs the same to Shivangi and Shivangi feels upset about the same as she is afraid that she might be exposed next. Shivangi decides to confront Rocky about the same on her own and approaches him in a hesitant manner.

44.title: Episode #2.44
44.plot: Sesha is chasing Rocky and Shivangi as they are heading towards their ancestral Mansion. Rocky tells Shivangi that they will have to divert Rudra to some other place before reaching that Mansion as he mistakes the snake following them to be Rudra. Rocky stops his car in the way all of a sudden and Sesha hides behind the trees. Rocky tells Shivangi to wait in the car and he will go and face Rudra in order to teach him a lesson. Shivangi tries to stop Rocky but he is adamant on facing the Naag. Sesha, on the other hand, wonders what Rocky is up to and watches as he ...

45.title: Episode #2.45
45.plot: Shivangi and Rudra are troubled as the snake charmers are in Rocky's house and playing the been in order to bring out the Naag. Rocky asks Shivangi that what happened and she tells him that she is feeling a little tired as they were outside and hides her truth from him. Nidhi helps her in hiding Shivangi's reality. Even Sesha is trying to find a way out of the house. Meanwhile, Rudra decides to give up his identity in order to save Shivangi's reality from being exposed in front of everyone. On the other hand, Vikram is about to enter the house and Sesha is worried ...

46.title: Episode #2.46
46.plot: Yamini enters Mahishmiti's magical chambers along with her and Sesha. She asks Mahishmiti that what trap has she put up for Rudra here. Mashmiti then performs her magic and calls upon the spirit of old bees to build a strong magical beehive so that it attracts anyone who comes in this room. Mahishmiti informs Sesha and Yamini that if any Naag or Nagin comes here than the hive will trap them and drain them of all the power.

47.title: Episode #2.47
47.plot: With the help of her Guru Ji, Shivangi rescues Rudra's dead body from the trap Yamini, Mahishmiti and Sesha have laid for her. They are shocked to see Rudra's dead body gone but they are not able to find out who took Rudra's body. On the other hand, Guruji performs the last rites for Rudra and converts his body into ash. However, Rudra's ash does not dissolve in the holy water and Guru Ji tells Shivangi that she will have to avenge Rudra's death as well and only then will his remains dissolve in water. Shivangi takes an oath that she will fulfill Rudra's last wish as ...

48.title: Episode #2.48
48.plot: Shivangi shows Sheeshupal how Yamini and Avantika had killed her mother, Shivanya. Sheeshupal feels sorry for Shivangi's loss and reveals to her the way Avantika can be killed. On the other hand, Rocky is worried for Shivangi and saying that he will not let anything happen to her. Just then Sesha reaches him in Shivangi's form and he promises to keep her safe, unaware that it is actually Sesha. Later, Shivangi turns herself into one of Avantika's minister in order to lure her to the trap.

49.title: Episode #2.49
49.plot: Shivangi tells Avantika that she will avenge her mother's death now. Shivangi tells Avantika that even Sheeshupal, Avantika's husband, is with her now and no one can stop her from taking revenge for her mother's death. Shivangi stabs Avantika again and again and reminds her how they had taken the life of her mother. Shivangi is now a step closer to fulfilling her promise and says that only three of her mother's murderers are left to kill now. Sheeshupal, meanwhile, tells Shivangi that she has taken her revenge by killing Avantika but he will have to take the final ...

50.title: Episode #2.50
50.plot: Rocky is high on Bhaang and on seeing Shivangi he thinks that he is mistaking Avantika to be Shivangi. Rocky and Robin go to drink more bhaang and Shivangi is left standing alone there as the family celebrates holi. Just then Yamini comes and asks Shivangi where Avantika is and Shivangi cooks up a story that she just left. Yamini thinks that Sesha will get mad in a rage now as Yamini failed to look at the face of Rudra's partner. Shivangi then excuses herself saying that she has to make lemonade for Rocky as he has consumed too much bhaang. Later, Shivangi comes to ...

51.title: Episode #2.51
51.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

52.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

53.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

 Be the first one to add a plot.

59.title: Episode #2.59
59.plot: Shivangi uncovers a series of disturbing secrets.

61.title: Episode #2.61
61.plot: Rocky is out for a kill.

63.title: Episode #2.63
63.plot: Ruchika is back from the dead.

69.title: Episode #2.69
69.plot: Rocky learns the truth about Ruchika and Yamini.

72.title: Episode #2.72
72.plot: Shivangi and Rocky out to avenge Avni's death.

74.title: Episode #2.74
74.plot: Ruchika receives a marriage proposal from Rocky.

imdb.plot outline: Naagin (shape shifting female snake) is a story of love and revenge. Naagin delves into the life of Ritik. Shivanya is stuck between two extreme emotions -- love and vengeance. Shivanya's friend, Sesha is her support system, but she has an ulterior motive that no one knows about. The constant conflict between love and revenge drive these protagonists together as their lives clash in a coming together of their past histories.
imdb.title: Naagin
plot: _Naagin_ (qv) (shape shifting female snake) is a story of love and revenge. _Naagin_ (qv) delves into the life of Ritik. Shivanya is stuck between two extreme emotions -- love and vengeance. Shivanya's friend, Sesha is her support system, but she has an ulterior motive that no one knows about. The constant conflict between love and revenge drive these protagonists together as their lives clash in a coming together of their past histories.
